statements: SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_salary FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, employee_salary FROM employees WHERE employee_salary > 50000 ORDER BY employee_salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position, employee_salary FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Engineer' OR employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000 ORDER BY employee_salary ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM Employees WHERE employee_role = 'Developer';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_email FROM Employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, tour_date, tour_location FROM Schedule JOIN Employees ON Schedule.employee_id = Employees.employee_id WHERE tour_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tour_date DESC;

SELECT employee_name, tour_date, tour_location FROM Schedule JOIN Employees ON Schedule.employee_id = Employees.employee_id WHERE tour_location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') AND tour_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role, employee_email FROM Employees WHERE employee_role != 'Manager' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE role = 'Supervisor' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, date, shift_start, shift_end FROM schedules WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT tour_id, location, date FROM tours WHERE guide_id = 456 AND date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE role = 'Guide' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT e.name, s.date, t.location FROM employees e INNER JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id INNER JOIN tours t ON e.employee_id = t.guide_id WHERE DATE(s.date) = '2022-10-15';
SELECT e.name, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM employees e INNER JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE TIME(s.shift_start) >= '08:00:00' AND TIME(s.shift_end) <= '15:00:00';
SELECT e.name, COUNT(t.tour_id) AS tours_completed FROM employees e LEFT JOIN tours t ON e.employee_id = t.guide_id GROUP BY e.name HAVING tours_completed >= 5 ORDER BY tours_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT tour_name, tour_type, tour_duration FROM tours ORDER BY tour_duration DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, location, max_capacity FROM facilities WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE max_capacity > 100;
SELECT e.employee_name, s.tour_date, t.tour_name FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN tours t ON s.tour_date = t.tour_date;
SELECT facility_name, location, max_capacity FROM facilities ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_role, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.tour_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, job_title FROM Employee ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT tour_name, duration_hours, price FROM Tour WHERE duration_hours > 3;
SELECT facility_id, name, location, manager_id FROM Facility WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT guide_id, certification FROM TourGuide ORDER BY guide_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, name, job_title FROM Employee WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.name, t.tour_name, s.date_time FROM Employee e JOIN Schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN Tour t ON s.tour_id = t.tour_id WHERE s.date_time >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT f.name AS facility_name, COUNT(s.schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM Facility f LEFT JOIN Schedule s ON f.facility_id = s.tour_id GROUP BY f.name;
SELECT TG.guide_id, E.name AS guide_name, TG.certification FROM TourGuide TG LEFT JOIN Employee E ON TG.employee_id = E.employee_id WHERE TG.certification LIKE '%certified%';
